definition[0]: bread that is crusty is pleasant to eat because it has a hard crust
definition[1]: someone who is crusty is bad-tempered
definition[2]: having a thin dry hard layer of something on the surface
example[2]: The lake was ringed by crusty salt deposits.
definition[3]: a young person with a dirty and untidy appearance, usually one who has no permanent job or home and takes part in protests about protecting the environment
